translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな男臭くて酒臭い場所に用はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have no business in a place so manly and smelling of alcohol.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は部屋に帰ってそろそろ寝る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going back to my room and will soon go to sleep."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、つれねーなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, how cold-hearted."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ランス様、待ってくださいー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Lord Rance, please wait!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、それでは失礼します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, then, please excuse me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本年も宜しくお願い致しますね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I look forward to your continued support this year as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、嬢ちゃんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, yeah, young lady,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今年も大変だろうが宜しくな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's going to be tough again this year, but take care of things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃあここは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つれない総統閣下が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the aloof Supreme Commander

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心変わりして戻ってくることを祈って――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will change his mind and return — we pray for that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かんぱーい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cheers!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう何度目になるかも分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had exchanged toasts so many times they had lost count.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乾杯が交わされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A toast was exchanged.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深夜、3時――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Late at night, 3 a.m. —

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが寝ても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though Rance had gone to sleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の宴会はまだ終わらない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the castle's banquet was still not over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも、確かに人の数は徐々に減っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, the number of people was definitely gradually decreasing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがに静かになってきましたね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's finally getting quiet, isn't it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私達も夜風で体を冷ましたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Once we cool our bodies with the night breeze,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷えすぎない内に寝ましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's go to bed before we get too cold."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、アールコートさんは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, where's Arcout?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すー……すー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Suu... suu..." (snoring sound)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くす、寝てしまったようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, it seems he’s fallen asleep."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お部屋に運びましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shall we carry him to his room?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その前に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Before that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その前に、もう一杯だけ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before that, just one more drink..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昨年はお疲れ様でした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for all your hard work last year.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また苦労の多い年になると思いますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it will be another year full of hardships,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本年も宜しくお願いします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I look forward to working with you again this year."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、いえいえ、こちらこそ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, no, no, it’s I who should say that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザさんには何度も助けられて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza-san has helped me many times...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふふ、本年も宜しくお願い致します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hehe, I look forward to your continued support this year."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深夜、4時――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Late at night, 4 a.m. —

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の中はすっかり静まり返る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The inside of Rance Castle had become completely quiet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時折、人の声も聞こえるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Occasionally, voices could still be heard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれもひそひそと囁くような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all whispers spoken quietly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑い声のみとなっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or just soft laughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どっはー……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Doh-ha...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つーかーれーたー……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm so ti-iired...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイドの休憩室でハイジが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the maid's break room, Heidi

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 椅子に飛び込むように乱暴に座った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: plopped roughly into a chair as if jumping in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様でした、先輩」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good job, senpai."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「周りの皆はワイワイ騒いでる中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "While everyone around is noisy and lively,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達だけ働かされるって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only we are made to work...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結構辛いものがあるわね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's pretty tough, you know..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メイドですもん、仕方ないですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're maids, so it can't be helped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、お蕎麦の残り、茹でて来ましたよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, I boiled the leftover soba for you."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The inside of Rance Castle had become completely quiet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時折、人の声も聞こえるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Occasionally, voices could still be heard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれもひそひそと囁くような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all whispers spoken quietly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑い声のみとなっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or just soft laughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どっはー……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Doh-ha...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つーかーれーたー……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm so ti-iired...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイドの休憩室でハイジが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the maid's break room, Heidi

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 椅子に飛び込むように乱暴に座った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: plopped roughly into a chair as if jumping in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様でした、先輩」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good job, senpai."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「周りの皆はワイワイ騒いでる中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "While everyone around is noisy and lively,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達だけ働かされるって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only we are made to work...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結構辛いものがあるわね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's pretty tough, you know..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メイドですもん、仕方ないですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're maids, so it can't be helped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、お蕎麦の残り、茹でて来ましたよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, I boiled the leftover soba for you."
